hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Install the Dependencies sudo zypper install -y java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel tar wget git
# Set Environment Variables export WORK_DIR=`pwd` export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xms1024m -Xmx1024m" export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin export M2_HOME=$PWD/apache-maven-3.5.0 export PATH=$M2_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
# Install Maven 3.5.0 cd $WORK_DIR wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.5.0/binaries/apache-maven-3.5.0-bin.tar.gz tar -xvzf apache-maven-3.5.0-bin.tar.gz
# Build & Install activemq cd $WORK_DIR git clone -b activemq-5.15.2 https://github.com/apache/activemq.git cd activemq mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true tar -xzf ~/.m2/repository/org/apache/activemq/apache-activemq/5.15.2/apache-activemq-5.15.2-bin.tar.gz
# Smoke Test (Optional) mvn -Dactivemq.tests=smoke test -fn
# Verify Apache ActiveMQ is starting correctly cd apache-activemq-5.15.2/bin ./activemq start sleep 300 grep "Apache ActiveMQ 5.15.2 (localhost, ID:*." ../data/activemq.log > started_log if grep -q "started" started_log then ./activemq bstat ./activemq stop > stopped_log if grep -q "Stopping broker: localhost" stopped_log; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi else exit 1 fi
